purpleculture_pinyin:
shuì
taxes; duties
налоги; обязанности
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 税)
Ideographic: Grain 禾 paid as tribute 兌; 兌 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
稅收 [ shuì shōu ]: taxation
稅務 [ shuì wù ]: taxation services; state revenue service
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 禾 [ hé ] cereal, grain, rice; plant, stalk
    • 兌 [ duì ] cash, check; to exchange
heisig_chinese_memo: Nobody likes the tax man, so here it is only fitting that the person who comes over to take some of your wheat is depicted here as a devil. Keep in mind that in feudal societies there was no kind of money to speak of, so taxes were paid by serfs in wheat to the devils who came over to keep them poor.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Nobody likes the tax man, so here it is only fitting that the person who comes over to take some of your wheat is depicted here as a devil. Keep in mind that in feudal societies there was no kind of money to speak of, so taxes were paid by serfs in wheat to the devils who came over to keep them poor.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " He " to " Dui " sound. The original meaning is Tian Fu. "Said Wen": "Tax, rent. Conghe, Duisheng." Examples such as "Xunzi. "Rich Country": "The taxation of light fields, the taxation of Pingguan City, the number of merchants in the province, hardly active military service, no time to seize agriculture, if so, then the country will be rich." "Hanshu. "Criminal Law Chronicles": "There are taxes and taxes, taxes are enough to eat, and taxes are given to soldiers." Yan Shigu's note: "Taxes, land rent." The extension means all taxes. Such as "Salt Iron Theory. Non-Martingale: "External equipment is a hundred times more profitable, the tax is collected from the mountain, the country is rich and the people are strong, the equipment is decorated, and there is more accumulation."

" Tax " as a verb means to levy taxes. Such as "Pipe. "Da Kuang": "There is no tax when you are hungry, but you are taxed when you are hungry." "Mencius. "Gongsun Chou 1": "The farmer will help but not tax, and the world's farmers will be happy and willing to farm in their wild."

" Tax " means release and release. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Tax, She also." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The Ninth Year of Zhuang Gong": "Guan Zhong invites prisoners, Uncle Bao accepts it, and the tax is paid to it." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. Shen Da": "Taxing horses in Huashan, taxing cows in Taolin, Ma Fu multiplying, Niu Fu re-serving." Gao Yin's note: "Tax, release."

" Tax " means gift. Such as "Book of Rites. "Tan Gong Shang": "A husband does not dare to tax people, such as a tax person, he will take the orders of his father and brother." Kong Yingda Shu: "Tax people, that is, the survivors of things." "History. "The Biography of Li Sheng and Lu Jia Lie": "Priyang Hou is paid a hundred gold to the tax."

" Tax " also means lease. For example, in the Tang Dynasty Baixingjian "Li Wa Biography": "I heard that there is a courtyard in this place, and I hope that taxes can be used to live. Believe it?" Yuan Hongdao of the Ming Dynasty "Meeting together": "The tax land planted peach blossoms, and ten trees and nine trees died."
humanum_short_description_en: From " He " to " Dui " sound. The original meaning is Tian Fu.
humanum_full_description:
從「禾」，「兌」聲。本義是田賦。《說文》：「稅，租也。从禾，兌聲。」例子如《荀子．富國》：「輕田野之稅，平關市之征，省商賈之數，罕興力役，無奪農時，如是，則國富矣。」《漢書．刑法志》：「有稅有賦，稅以足食，賦以足兵。」顏師古注：「稅，田租也。」引申表示一切賦稅。如《鹽鐵論．非鞅》：「外設百倍之利，收山澤之稅，國富民強，器械完飾，蓄積有餘。」

　　「稅」作動詞表示徵收賦稅。如《管子．大匡》：「歲饑不稅，歲饑弛而稅。」《孟子．公孫丑上》：「耕者助而不稅，則天下之農皆悅而願耕於其野矣。」

　　「稅」表示釋放、解舍。《爾雅．釋詁》：「稅，舍也。」如《左傳．莊公九年》：「管仲請囚，鮑叔受之，及堂阜而稅之。」《呂氏春秋．慎大》：「乃稅馬於華山，稅牛於桃林，馬弗復乘，牛弗復服。」高誘注：「稅，釋也。」

　　「稅」表示贈送。如《禮記．檀弓上》：「夫仕者不敢稅人，如稅人則以父兄之命。」孔穎達疏：「稅人，謂以物遺人也。」《史記．酈生陸賈列傳》：「辟陽侯乃奉百金往稅。」

　　「稅」也表示租賃。如唐代白行簡《李娃傳》：「聞茲地有隙院，願稅以居，信乎？」明代袁宏道〈相逢行〉：「稅地植桃花，十樹九樹死。」

從「 禾 」，「 兌 」聲。本義是田賦。《說文》：「稅，租也。从禾，兌聲。」例子如《荀子．富國》：「輕田野之稅，平關市之征，省商賈之數，罕興力役，無奪農時，如是，則國富矣。」《漢書．刑法志》：「有稅有賦，稅以足食，賦以足兵。」顏師古注：「稅，田租也。」引申表示一切賦稅。如《鹽鐵論．非鞅》：「外設百倍之利，收山澤之稅，國富民強，器械完飾，蓄積有餘。」 「 稅 」作動詞表示徵收賦稅。如《管子．大匡》：「歲饑不稅，歲饑弛而稅。」《孟子．公孫丑上》：「耕者助而不稅，則天下之農皆悅而願耕於其野矣。」 「 稅 」表示釋放、解舍。《爾雅．釋詁》：「稅，舍也。」如《左傳．莊公九年》：「管仲請囚，鮑叔受之，及堂阜而稅之。」《呂氏春秋．慎大》：「乃稅馬於華山，稅牛於桃林，馬弗復乘，牛弗復服。」高誘注：「稅，釋也。」 「 稅 」表示贈送。如《禮記．檀弓上》：「夫仕者不敢稅人，如稅人則以父兄之命。」孔穎達疏：「稅人，謂以物遺人也。」《史記．酈生陸賈列傳》：「辟陽侯乃奉百金往稅。」 「 稅 」也表示租賃。如唐代白行簡《李娃傳》：「聞茲地有隙院，願稅以居，信乎？」明代袁宏道〈相逢行〉：「稅地植桃花，十樹九樹死。」
